localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. ⠀ It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
blogPost.body: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. ⠀ It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
blogPost.title: Stonksfolio - Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Stonksfolio是一个由社区支持的免费项目，它可以在一个地方轻松跟踪多种股票、ETF和加密投资。⠀它显示了历史业绩和一些有用的指标，可以帮助你决定如何调整你的投资。
localize.tagline: 深入了解股票和ETF的投资表现。

localize.description: Stonksfolio是一個由社區支持的免費項目，它可以在一個地方輕鬆跟蹤多種股票、ETF和加密投資。⠀它顯示了歷史業績和一些有用的指標，可以幫助你決定如何調整你的投資。
localize.tagline: 深入瞭解股票和ETF的投資表現。

previous.title:
Gambling is not fairer than the stock market

You just have to have a long-term time horizon

Show me a sports book w/these kinds of probabilities for winning https://t.co/aTqiXqQGTX https://t.co/GEL6DwXmjZ

localize.full_text:
赌博并不比股市更公平。

你只需要有一个长期的时间范围。

给我看一个有这种赢钱概率的体育博彩https://t.co/aTqiXqQGTX。
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 如今的体育博彩绝对是一个比股市更公平的游戏。到了最后，有赢有输，而且直接与数字相关。

localize.full_text:
賭博並不比股市更公平。

你只需要有一個長期的時間範圍。

給我看一個有這種贏錢概率的體育博彩https://t.co/aTqiXqQGTX。
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 如今的體育博彩絕對是一個比股市更公平的遊戲。到了最後，有贏有輸，而且直接與數字相關。
